title: Open Archive of Educational Chemistry Notebooks
description: An open collection of educational Jupyter Notebooks relevant to chemistry. The notebooks can e.g. exemplify how to use a theory, process experimental data, or visualise data. It can also be tutorials, labs, etc.

creators.name: Jens Uhlig
creators.affiliation: Division of Chemical Physics, Department of Chemistry, Lund University, Sweden

creators.name: Mikael Lund
creators.affiliation: Division of Computational Chemistry, Department of Chemistry, Lund University, Sweden
